field.name: id
field.description: Autogenerated key

field.name: owner
field.description: User to which this record belongs. Is nillable for development purposes.

entity.name: BinaryData
entity.description: This table keeps track of binary data uploaded to file store.

field.name: id
field.description: Autogenerated key

field.name: received
field.description: When server received, stored and parsed this binary data file

field.name: dataType
field.description: Indicates how data should be interpreted

field.name: page
field.description: Page on which the data is stored. (Null if no page data)

field.name: owner
field.description: User to which this record belongs. Is nillable for development purposes.

field.name: id
field.description: Autogenerated key

field.name: activity
field.description: specific name of the activity. See https://dev.moves-app.com/docs/api_activity_list#activity_table for list of currently supported activities

field.name: groupName
field.description: a more generic activity supergroup to which the action belongs to. If defined, one of: walking, running, cycling or transport. Note that there can be additional groups in the future

field.name: manual
field.description: whether the activity was manually added by user. Note that only in-place activities can currently be added manually. Geo-activities are currently never manually added, even if corrected by user to a different activity.

field.name: startTime
field.description: start time of the activity if known in ISO 8601 (yyyyMMdd’T’HHmmssZ)

field.name: endTime
field.description: end time of the activity if known in ISO 8601 (yyyyMMdd’T’HHmmssZ) format

field.name: duration
field.description: duration of the activity in seconds

field.name: distance
field.description: distance for the activity in meters

field.name: steps
field.description: step count for the activity (if applicable)

field.name: calories
field.description: calories burn for the activity in kcal (if applicable), on top of the idle burn. Available if user has at least once enabled calories

field.name: owner
field.description: User to which this record belongs. Is nillable for development purposes.

field.name: id
field.description: Autogenerated key

field.name: firstdate
field.description: First date from which there might be data for the user, in yyyyMMdd format

field.name: currentTimeZoneId
field.description: time zone identifier for users current time zone

field.name: currentTimeZoneOffset
field.description: offset to UTC in seconds

field.name: language
field.description: users language as BCP 47 language code

field.name: locale
field.description: users locale ID

field.name: firstWeekDay
field.description: users first day of the week, 1=Sunday, 2=Monday

field.name: metric
field.description: whether user prefers metric units

field.name: caloriesAvailable
field.description: whether calories are available for user

field.name: platform
field.description: users current platform, one of ios or android

field.name: movestoken
field.description: Ref to moves token

entity.name: MovesToken
entity.description: see Receiving an access token at https://dev.moves-app.com/docs/authentication

field.name: id
field.description: Autogenerated key

field.name: accessToken
field.description: a valid access token to use Moves API

field.name: token_type
field.description: only “bearer” type tokens are used

field.name: expires_in
field.description: the access token lifetime in seconds

field.name: refresh_token
field.description: used to refresh an access token via refresh token call

field.name: user_id
field.description: a unique identifier (64 bit unsigned) of the user associated with the access token

field.name: owner
field.description: User to which this record belongs. Is nillable for development purposes.

field.name: id
field.description: Autogenerated key

field.name: idOnPump
field.description: ID used on pump. Number may be too high for type Long, so we use string.

field.name: serverReportedDateAndTime
field.description: Time exception was reported to server

field.name: gender
field.description: Gender of user.

field.name: bodyWeight
field.description: Weight of user. Together with length BMI can be computed.

field.name: length
field.description: Length of user. Together with bodyweight BMI can be computed.

field.name: birthYear
field.description: Year that user is born.

field.name: lastchanged
field.description: Timestamp user switched on or of.

field.name: timezone
field.description: Time on device + timezone(in minutes) = GMT.

field.name: owner
field.description: User to which this record belongs. Is nillable for development purposes.

field.name: id
field.description: Autogenerated key

field.name: isRecording
field.description: Indicates whether user is recording

field.name: timestamp
field.description: Timestamp user switched on or of.

field.name: owner
field.description: User to which this record belongs. Is nillable for development purposes.

field.name: primaryKey
field.description: Autogenerated key

field.name: id
field.description: Generated id on client, used to identify.

field.name: deleted
field.description: Indicates whether this record is deleted.

field.name: lastchanged
field.description: Moment when this record was created or last changed (bookkeeping). In milliseconds since 1970 in GMT.

field.name: name
field.description: Name of event

field.name: owner
field.description: User to which this record belongs. Is nillable for development purposes.

field.name: id
field.description: Autogenerated key

field.name: owner
field.description: User to which this record belongs. Is nillable for development purposes.

field.name: exception
field.description: Text of the exception

field.name: entity
field.description: Entity.toString() it concerns

field.name: dateAndTime
field.description: Time exception occured

field.name: id
field.description: Autogenerated key

field.name: exception
field.description: Text of the exception

field.name: query
field.description: executed query

field.name: clientDateAndTime
field.description: Moment when error occured on device. In milliseconds since 1970 in GMT.

field.name: serverReportedDateAndTime
field.description: Time exception was reported to server

field.name: owner
field.description: User to which this record belongs. Is nillable for development purposes.

field.name: name
field.description: Name of event

field.name: carbs
field.description: Size of this event in terms of grams of carbs.

field.name: alcoholicUnits
field.description: Number of 'alcholic units' in this event. One unit corresponds to a standard glass.

field.name: portionsize
field.description: Size of this event in terms of.

field.name: estimationCarbs
field.description: Wheter user estimated the size.

field.name: power
field.description: Calories / kilo gram body weight / hour.

field.name: eventId
field.description: Client foreign key to Event

field.name: beginTime
field.description: Moment on which event begins. In milliseconds since 1970 in GMT. Null if not applicable.

field.name: amount
field.description: Number of times this food is consumed.

field.name: intensity
field.description: Intensity of activity. 1=v. light, ..., 3=normal, ..., 10=v. heavy.

field.name: endTime
field.description: Moment when event ends. In milliseconds since 1970 in GMT. Null for Food events.

field.name: primaryKey
field.description: Primary key currently need to be autogenerated with molgenis, field id is the actual identifier

field.name: id
field.description: Generated id on client, used to identify.

field.name: moment
field.description: Store date/time 'as you see it on your watch' so that we can check whether it corresponds to 'unixtime' after correcting for time zone and day light saving.

field.name: deleted
field.description: Indicates whether this record is deleted.

field.name: lastchanged
field.description: Moment when this record was created or last changed (bookkeeping). In milliseconds since 1970 in GMT.

field.name: owner
field.description: User to which this record belongs. Is nillable for development purposes.

entity.name: LastSynced
entity.description: This table lives only on clients.

field.name: id
field.description: Client should autogenerate an id that uniquely identifies this record.

field.name: timestamp
field.description: Before sync'ing app with server a transaction is started. At the beginning of this transaction, the current time is stored.

entity.name: TimeZone
entity.description: Shifts to GMT in which clients live. First line in this table is used to convert timestamps of pump data to GMT.

field.name: shift
field.description: Time shift in ms compared to GMT.

field.name: deviceId
field.description: ID that is unique for this client, given an owner.

field.name: id
field.description: Autogenerated id that uniquely identifies this record.

field.name: idOnPump
field.description: ID used on pump. Number may be too high for type Long, so we use string.

field.name: uploadId
field.description: ID, different for each time data is uploaded.

field.name: owner
field.description: User to which this record belongs. Is nillable for development purposes.

field.name: dateTimeString
field.description: Store date/time 'as you see it on your watch'.

field.name: unixtimeOriginal
field.description: Moment on which 'measurement' was acquired. In ms since 1970, as stored in the pump. Local time. No correction for DLS or time zone. Null if not applicable.

field.name: unixtimeCorrected
field.description: Orginal unixtime: ms since 1970 in GMT. Corrected for time zone and DLS. Also corrected for small time adjustments.

field.name: newTime
field.description: Timestamp in ms since 1970 in GMT to which time is changed by user.

field.name: amount
field.description: dg/dL calibration

field.name: paradigmLinkId
field.description: ID of the coupled meter.

field.name: amount
field.description: Unit: g/L. Divide by 18.0182 for mM.

field.name: isig
field.description: Sensor current in subcutaneous interstitial fluid.

field.name: vcntr
field.description: Counter electrode voltage

field.name: amount
field.description: Actual amount of insulin released (IE).

field.name: programmedAmount
field.description: Intended amount of insulin (IE).

field.name: duration
field.description: Period in which bolus 'amount' is uniformly injected (ms).

field.name: name
field.description: Name of the collection of basal insulin profiles.

field.name: numberOfProfiles
field.description: Number of profiles in this collection.

field.name: groupId
field.description: Refers to idOnPump of a BasalProfileDefinitionGroup

field.name: profileIndex
field.description: Index of this insulin profile (0, 1, ...).

field.name: startTime
field.description: Start time of this basal profile (in ms since 0:00h).

field.name: groupName
field.description: BasalProfileDefinitionGroup to which this profile belongs.

field.name: profileIndex
field.description: Index of this insulin profile (0, 1, ...).

field.name: startTime
field.description: Start time of this basal profile (in ms since 0:00h).

field.name: duration
field.description: Duration of this temporal change of the basal profile (in ms).

field.name: fraction
field.description: Fraction of basal profile.

field.name: duration
field.description: Duration of this temporal change of the basal profile (in ms).

field.name: nRatios
field.description: Number of profiles in this collection.

field.name: groupId
field.description: Refers to idOnPump of a ChangeCarbRatioGroup

field.name: ratioIndex
field.description: Number of this ratio (0, 1, ...)

field.name: amount
field.description: Units of carbs corresponding to 1 unit (IE) of insulin.

field.name: unit
field.description: Unit of carbs: e.g. grams.

field.name: startTime
field.description: Start time from when on this ratio is active (in ms since 0:00h).

field.name: nSensitivities
field.description: Number of profiles in this collection.

field.name: groupId
field.description: Refers to idOnPump of a ChangeInsulinSensitivityGroup

field.name: sensitivityIndex
field.description: Number of this ratio (0, 1, ...)

field.name: amount
field.description: dg/dL that BG will be lowered after 1 unit (IE) of insulin.

field.name: startTime
field.description: Start time from when on this ratio is active (in ms since 0:00h).

field.name: state
field.description: Indicates whether pump is suspended. Can be at least: user_suspend, normal_pumping.

field.name: suspended
field.description: Now as boolean: Indicates whether pump is suspended, and does thus not pump.

field.name: actionRequestor
field.description: Mostly pump

field.name: preState
field.description: Previous state

entity.name: BasalSetting
entity.description: Basal profile setting, taking into account the programmed amount and the temporal change.

entity.name: Basal
entity.description: Basal bolus as it may be released in practice.

entity.name: ModelParameterInsulin
entity.description: Parameters for insulin in the model.

field.name: id
field.description: autogenerated id number (autoid)

field.name: insulinName
field.description: Name of this insulin.

field.name: peak
field.description: Period (minutes) after which insulin reaches peak

field.name: pct95
field.description: Period (minutes) after which 95% of insulin is absorbed

entity.name: ModelParameterCarbs
entity.description: Parameters for carbs in the model.

field.name: id
field.description: autogenerated id number (autoid).

field.name: carbType
field.description: Type of carbs. Each food can be seen as a waited sum of slow, normal and quick carbs.

field.name: peak
field.description: Period (minutes) after which carb intake reaches peak.

field.name: pct95
field.description: Period (minutes) after which 95% of carbs is absorbed.

field.name: glycIndex
field.description: Glycemic index of this food. This parameter is optional.

entity.name: Grid
entity.description: Grid with data. Can be of type bg, delta bg, ins, carb, and activity

field.name: id
field.description: autogenerated id number (autoid).

field.name: name
field.description: Type of values in grid.

field.name: insulin
field.description: Parameters we need to model insulin bolus.

field.name: carbs
field.description: Parameters we need to model insulin bolus.

field.name: matrix
field.description: A matrix (R-object) with bg, or delta bg, or insulin, or carb, or exercise per moment of day.
